home.hero_desc: Discover the best tents and supplies and book them with a click.

stats.accurate_label: Pick your spot on the map
stats.support_label: We are with you every step

home.featured_desc: Choose from a selection of tents equipped with the latest facilities.
home.no_services: No services available at the moment.
home.cta_desc: Book your tent today and enjoy the best camping experience with family and friends.

footer.description: Your premier destination for booking the best tents and camping supplies.

services.page_subtitle: We prepared everything for you. Pick items individually or choose a ready package.
services.no_items: No items found in this category currently
services.add_error_role: Sorry, Admins and Service Providers cannot place orders.

service_detail.guarantee_desc: Your trip is 100% guaranteed. If the service differs from description, full refund is guaranteed.
service_detail.be_first: Be the first to review this service!

about_us.hero_desc: Kashta exists to solve one problem: making camping, desert, and sea trips easy, fun, and hassle-free.
about_us.why_desc: Because we believe the best moments are made in nature, not in preparing for them.
about_us.feature_1_desc: Pick your spot on the map, even in the middle of the desert, and leave the rest to us.
about_us.feature_2_desc: From tents and furniture to lighting, everything you need in one place.
about_us.feature_3_desc: Quality is our standard. Every service and tent on our platform is carefully inspected and selected.
about_us.cta_desc: Browse our services now and start planning your next trip worry-free.

my_bookings.page_subtitle: Track your orders and view your Kashta history
my_bookings.no_bookings_desc: Start your first trip with us, book your tent and enjoy an unforgettable experience.
my_bookings.empty_filter: No bookings found in this list

tracker.step_confirmed: Approved! Your order is being prepared.
tracker.step_ready: Loaded up! Your order is on the way.
tracker.step_cancelled: Oh no! Unfortunately, the order is cancelled.
